name: Gander
headline: Automation System for Global Aviation
description: Gander builds products for aviation businesses looking to streamline their operations

founders.name: Arjan Guglani, Founder
founders.description: Building LLMs for the Aviation Industry. Prev United, American, and Insight Partners

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Gander**

**Mission:**  
Gander is dedicated to revolutionizing global aviation through innovative automation systems. Their mission focuses on building AI tools tailored for the aviation sector that prioritize design, simplicity, and cost efficiency.

**Background:**  
Founded in 2024, Gander emerged from the YMCA Batch F24 program and is based in New York City. It initially set out to help aviation businesses streamline their operations, addressing a critical need in an industry that often struggles with complexity and inefficiency.

**Team:**  
The company is small but mighty, consisting of a tight-knit team of just two employees. Despite its size, Gander enjoys the backing of prominent figures in the startup ecosystem, including Garry Tan as their Group Partner.

**Services and Offerings:**  
Currently, Gander focuses on developing intelligent automation products specifically designed for the unique challenges of the aviation industry. Their offerings are characterized by user-centric design and a commitment to reducing operational costs for businesses in aviation.

**Tags:**  
Gander operates in a niche space categorized under SaaS (Software as a Service), AI (Artificial Intelligence), and customer support—all crucial elements in promoting efficiency and innovation in aviation.

**Website:**  
You can learn more about their initiatives and offerings at [usegander.com](https://usegander.com).

**In Summary:**  
Gander is positioning itself as a key player in the automation landscape of the aviation industry. Backed by Y Combinator and with a clear mission, this New Yorker startup aims to simplify and enhance aviation operations with cutting-edge AI solutions. If you're in the aviation business looking to streamline operations, keep an eye on what Gander has to offer!
